jobs.title: Content Creator for Gambling Sector
jobs.description:
https://betandslots.com/  is a fast growing website created by a team of gambling experts. We provide users with the newest and most popular games, in-depth online casino reviews and latest industry news.

 Currently we are looking for new members to join our team. 

Whether you have job experience or not we believe that we can develop your skills 

. We offer great career opportunities.

At the current moment we need experienced writers to write for us:

Reviews of online casinos, softwares, available payment options for gambling and slot game reviews.

The main requirements are :

Perfect English skills
Wish to immerse in this top

The rest will be tought by our Content director.
